text: José Jiménez Ruiz (born 24 May 1946) is a Spanish Air Force general. He became Chief of Staff of the Air Force on 18 July 2008. General Francisco Javier García Arnáiz replaced him on 31 July de 2012. ==Dates of rank== * Caballero - 1966 * Alférez Alumno - 1968 * Teniente - 1970 * Capitán - 1974 * Comandante - 1983 * Teniente Coronel - 1989 * Coronel - 1997 * General de Brigada - 2001 * General de División - 2005 * Teniente General - 2008 * General del Aire - 2008 ==References== Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:Military personnel from Madrid Category:Spanish generals
title: José Jiménez Ruiz
